mapper.insert: INSERT INTO other_info (age,careAddr, careNm, careTel, colorCd, desertionNo, filename, happenDt, happenPlace, kindCd, neuterYn, noticeEdt, noticeNo, noticeSdt, officetel, orgNm, popfile, processState, sexCd, specialMark, weight) VALUES(#{age}, #{careAddr}, #{careNm}, #{careTel}, #{colorCd}, #{desertionNo}, #{filename}, #{happenDt}, #{happenPlace}, #{kindCd}, #{neuterYn}, #{noticeEdt}, #{noticeNo}, #{noticeSdt}, #{officetel}, #{orgNm}, #{popfile}, #{processState}, #{sexCd}, #{specialMark}, #{weight});
